talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter: Oh, I see your Korean import Frenchy meat dog and raise you a $4k purebred golden retriever pup shipped from a Turkish puppymill, where he was somehow both a starving street dog and going to be eaten by Muslims they do that there you know.

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter: A colleague married a Turk and now lives next door to a golden retriever factory where they produce exclusively for “rescue” export. Very lucrative.

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter: ah yes the source of all those supposed Turkish golden retriever street dogs

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter: while I am no fan of puppy mills one almost has to respect the hustle

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
It’s hardly even sporting, ripping off Americans with a swindle that dumb.

It’s the swindle version of shooting bison from the rail car.

They couldn’t stop if they wanted to, the lust must just take you away with it.

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
It’s hardly even sporting, ripping off Americans with a swindle that dumb.

It’s the swindle version of shooting bison from the rail car.

They couldn’t stop if they wanted to, the lust must just take you away with it.

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter: To be fair, the Americans in question also desperately want to believe the tear-jerker origin story, so I guess both parties get what they wanted..

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
Hoo boy DO NOT confront them with the reality, THEY DO NOT LIKE IT.

And getting back to the main theme, absolutely unfuckable. Not even a one-and-done. Same as having no books.

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter: Overfinished, even for a lard breed. Lotta waste there, that excess visceral fat doesn’t even render well. Chops will have as much rind as you like.

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter:
if we're going down this particularly cancel-able line of inquiry, one wonders what the best meat breed would be 

labradors are definitely easy keepers, but are they too small?

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
Growth rate, feed conversion ratio, hardiness, thrives on poor quality grain-heavy food — it’s beagles FTW.

The Lab takes too long to start putting meat on frame.

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter: Makes sense. Dog looks poorly, cut your losses and sell. Stray dogs? The ones starting to become unwell with brain virus is easier to catch.

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter: Indeed. Dog eating is a public health risk, all ethics aside, since it’s not like there’s a standardized supply chain to reduce rabies risk in play.

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
Tapes, ascarids.

We share more zoonoses and parasites with pigs, I think, but dogs are close behind.

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter: Truly the most baffling dogpile of them all, yeah, verily, exceeding even the oppressor gift chili incident

talk.author: did:plc:6tymxnn2kl65fd5fqhcmaq74
talk.utter: Imagine introducing someone to social media and having to explain all these sad references…

talk.author: did:plc:f4ifld6ms4p376hp3vs24fls
talk.utter:
I try to describe them to Perfesser Chaos and generally have to give up.

Bright side, he keeps demanding I explain the biblically-correct Alf sticker on my car and I refuse.
